name: AeternoBlade
synopsis: AeternoBlade v1.1 Update This update will fix the following important issues: 1. Fix a struck bug where you can enter Eternal Void twice via Great Pyramid stage and will got lock-up in that stage. 2. Fix an issue with "Freeze Gear" item, which you will lose it forever if you miss the puzzle once. Results in never be able to complete a 100% save game. 3. Fix application freezes and crashes while loading. 4. Fix attack timing in Jump-Down-Attack move. 5. Fix "Return to last checkpoint" command when fighting with Chrono Lord.
